Source: _fixed/common/parts/_modalDialog.styl, line 1

11.6 Modal Dialog

When using this, do not control Style directly, but use MyModel or v-if with instead..

Example

Modal Title
Modal Description
<!-- ModalDialog start -->
<div class="modalDialog" style="display:none">
  <div class="modalDialog_content">
    <div class="modalDialog_content_title">Modal Title</div>
    <div class="modalDialog_content_description">Modal Description</div>
    <div class="modalDialog_content_footerButtons">
      <button class="modalDialog_content_footerButtons_button basicButtonPrimary">Button1</button>
      <button class="modalDialog_content_footerButtons_button basicButtonNormal">Button2</button>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!-- ModalDialog end -->
<button onclick="showModalDialog()">Show</button>
<script>
//
// When using this, do not control Style directly, but use MyModel or v-if with <transition> instead.
//
function showModalDialog() {
  document.getElementsByClassName('modalDialog')[0].style.display = null;
}
function closeModalDialog() {
  document.getElementsByClassName('modalDialog')[0].style.display = 'none';
}
document.querySelectorAll('.modalDialog, .modalDialog_content_footerButtons_button').forEach((el) => {
  el.onclick = closeModalDialog;
});
document.querySelectorAll('.modalDialog_content').forEach((el) => {
  el.onclick = (ev) => {
    ev.stopPropagation();
  };
});
</script>
